Summary: Mystery balls of light in western sky of White Mts, NH
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Carroll
There was one other sighting in Carroll on or around September 18th 2008
divs: sighting detailsthere was a series of lights in a short event. a ball of gold\copper light with glowing sphere around it about the size of a dime if held at arms length. light faded out and came back on within 1-2 seconds then moved in sequence to the left and diagonally down. movements to the left every 1-2 seconds fading on\off all the time. the 5th time it came back on, it was behind a tree line on a mt. top but i could still make out the glow behind the sticks. rapidly, another ball of light appeared far off to the right of where the first ball appeared. then it multiplied 1x, 2x,3x,5x, from its center to both left and right each time it went on\off until all 5 balls of light vanished like someone turned off a switch. in the background of space i also noticed tiny rapidly moving strobes 2 or 3, moving like bees in the sky. just seemed like these objects could have been launched these lights in a sequence. other people in nearby towns also saw them.
